page.title: 11SCHOOLBOY POCKET MONEY
page.content: I am 12 year old Jamie Aichison and am a pupil in Primary 7.I spend about Â£6 per week.About 50p of this I spend on sweets or chewing gum or perhaps cans of juice from the school tuck shop.If I go to the swimming pool that costs 45p plus 25p spending money.Going to the local pictures costs Â£1 plus 50p spending money.I spend Â£2 per week at the Amusement Arcade on the Video Games or slot machines.If I win I just feed the money back in until it is all lost.If I go to the nearby town of Berwick at the week-end,the bus fare costs 90p return.A comic costs 15p,a 'paperback about Â£1-50. A single record costs Â£1.50 and an 'L.P.'costs Â£5 so I don't buy them often.I hope to get a 'Paper-round' next year when I'm 13 ,for which I'll get Â£5 a week.
